description:
Connect the hose to your garden sprinklers and watch your flowers instantly grow, revealing a beautiful scene.

Features:
- Designed for logic puzzle lovers.
- 50 handcrafted stages to solve.
- Puzzle sizes: 6x6, 8x8, and 10x10.
- Enjoy 15 beautiful environments.
- An original soundtrack designed to keep you immersed and focused on the game.
- Lots of love and thought put into every detail of the game.
name: Mini Gardens
intro: Mini Gardens is a logic puzzle game inspired by Japanese puzzles.
